item.title: Jumei expands its online beauty offerings
item.description:
Source: Jumei website. Jumei International Holding, a Chinese online retailer specializing in beauty products, has formed several strategic alliances with international brands. The company revealed that Max Factor and OPI Products have joined its Authentic Beauty Product Alliance (ABPA) and that it has established a partnership with American fashion designer Jill Stuart. Through its website and mobile app, the company provides a variety of products, including branded beauty items, fashionable apparel, and other lifestyle goods...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/jumei-expands-its-online-beauty-offerings/
